Conjunctions_key1:
Conjunctions are connectors. They join words of the same category, phrases, clauses or
sentences.
Conjunctions_key3: Red and green are the colours in traffic signals.
Conjunctions_key4: Pay your fee on time or you will have to give a fine.
Conjunctions_key5: We must take the umbrella because it may rain today.
